description:
About the Role
We are seeking a Financial Analyst who combines financial modeling capability with hands-on experience in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and TypeScript.
This role focuses on translating financial logic and statistical reasoning into scalable web-based simulation systems and decision-support tools.
Candidates with 2–3 years of relevant experience are preferred. Strong fresh graduates with solid technical foundations are also welcome to apply.
Key Responsibilities
Build and structure financial models (forecasting, cash flow, scenario analysis).
Implement financial logic in MERN + TypeScript applications.
Develop and enhance React-based dashboards and simulation interfaces.
Build backend services using Node.js and Express.
Manage financial data using MongoDB.
Integrate APIs and handle structured data flows (REST, JSON).
Test and validate model accuracy within web systems.
Collaborate with consultants and product teams on system improvements.

Requirements
Degree in IT / Computer Science, Finance, Business, or a related field.
2–3 years of relevant experience in financial analysis, modeling, or related roles (fresh graduates with strong technical skills may also apply).
Demonstrated experience building financial models (academic, internship, or professional).
Proficiency in TypeScript.
Practical understanding of the MERN stack
Understanding of frontend–backend data flow.
Familiarity with REST APIs and JSON.
Experience with Git.
Strong analytical reasoning and structured problem-solving skills.

What You’ll Gain
Exposure to real-world simulation systems used in corporate decision-making.
Hands-on experience building scalable financial engines in a modern web stack.
Cross-functional collaboration across finance, product, and engineering.
Growth toward Simulation Developer, Financial Systems Engineer, or Product Modeling roles.
About Int Labs
Int Labs is an innovative training and consultancy company built by practitioners, entrepreneurs, and founders. Originating in Singapore, we specialize in providing experiential, simulation-based training solutions, focusing on leadership development, innovation capabilities, and strategic planning for ambitious corporations in Indonesia and across the region.

description:
Kesempatan
PT Pristine Prima Lestari, perusahaan yang bergerak di bidang produksi Bumbu (Seasoning), mencari Sales Data Analyst yang berpengalaman untuk bergabung dengan tim kami di Cengkareng, Jakarta Raya. Sebagai Sales Data Analyst, Anda akan memainkan peran penting dalam menganalisis dan melaporkan data penjualan untuk mendukung strategi penjualan dan pengambilan keputusan bisnis. Kandidat yang ideal memiliki kemampuan analitis yang kuat, pemahaman yang mendalam tentang tren pasar, dan kemampuan untuk menerjemahkan wawasan data menjadi tindakan yang dapat dieksekusi.
Tanggung Jawab
Mengumpulkan, menganalisis, dan menafsirkan data penjualan untuk mengidentifikasi peluang peningkatan kinerja penjualan.
Membuat laporan dan dashboard penjualan yang informatif untuk mengomunikasikan wawasan dan tren kepada tim manajemen.
Berkolaborasi dengan tim penjualan dan pemasaran untuk memberikan rekomendasi strategis berdasarkan analisis data.
Memantau dan menganalisis kinerja produk, pelanggan, dan saluran distribusi untuk mengidentifikasi area peningkata.
Menyiapkan laporan performa penjualan secara berkala.
Melakukan forecasting penjualan dan analisis kinerja.
Mengevaluasi efektivitas promosi, harga, dan campaign penjualan.
Memastikan akurasi dan konsistensi data pada seluruh sistem pelaporan.
Memahami konfigurasi CRM serta mendukung proses implementasi dan penggunaannya.
Berpartisipasi dalam proyek-proyek strategis di fungsi Sales & Marketing.

Kualifikasi
Pendidikan minimal S1 di bidang Statistik, Matematika, Data Science, Bisnis, Sistem Informasi, atau bidang terkait.
Minimal 2 tahun pengalaman sebagai Data Analyst, Business Analyst atau posisi serupa (pengalaman di industri manufaktur menjadi nilai tambah).
Mahir menggunakan Microsoft Excel (pivot table, rumus tingkat lanjut, data analysis tools, dan pembuatan dashboard).
Memahami metrik penjualan (revenue/pendapatan, growth rate/tingkat pertumbuhan, conversion rate/tingkat konversi, dan lain-lain).
Memiliki kemampuan analitis yang kuat, teliti terhadap detail, serta memiliki kemampuan problem solving yang baik.
Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik dan mampu menyampaikan insight/data secara jelas kepada stakeholder.

Have strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and have good problem solving skills.
Have good communication skills and be able to convey insight/data clearly to stakeholders.

Optimasi Inventory: Menganalisis siklus hidup produk (product lifecycle) dan memberikan rekomendasi strategi markdown (diskon) atau restock untuk menjaga kesehatan stok di gudang dan toko.
Riset Pasar & Tren: Melakukan analisis kompetitor dan tren fashion untuk membantu tim Merchandising menentukan arah koleksi berikutnya.
Evaluasi Promosi: Menghitung ROI (Return on Investment) dari setiap kampanye marketing dan promosi toko guna memastikan efektivitas anggaran.
Peningkatan Proses Bisnis: Mengidentifikasi inefisiensi dalam operasional retail (seperti alur distribusi atau sistem kasir) dan mengusulkan solusi perbaikan.
Pelaporan Strategis: Menyusun presentasi laporan yang mendalam namun mudah dipahami oleh jajaran manajemen sebagai landasan pengambilan keputusan.
Kualifikasi & Persyaratan:
Pendidikan: Minimal S1 di bidang Bisnis, Manajemen, Ekonomi, Statistika, atau Teknik Industri.
Pengalaman: Minimal 2-3 tahun pengalaman sebagai Business Analyst atau posisi serupa (diutamakan dari industri Retail atau E-commerce).
Kemampuan Analitis: Memiliki kemampuan berpikir kritis yang kuat, mampu menghubungkan titik-titik data yang berbeda menjadi satu kesimpulan logis.
Kemampuan Teknis:
Mahir dalam menggunakan Microsoft Excel (Advanced: Pivot Table, VLOOKUP/XLOOKUP, Macro/VBA).
Familiar dengan alat visualisasi data seperti Tableau, Power BI, atau BI BES.
Memahami dasar-dasar SQL untuk penarikan data merupakan nilai tambah.
Keahlian Bisnis: Memahami konsep KPI retail seperti Same-Store Sales Growth (SSSG), Sell-through Rate, dan Gross Margin Return on Investment (GMROI).
Komunikasi: Mampu berkomunikasi dengan baik dan mempresentasikan ide secara persuasif kepada berbagai tingkat pemangku kepentingan.
Karakter: Jujur, teliti, proaktif, dan mampu bekerja di bawah tekanan dalam lingkungan retail yang dinamis.

description:
The Digitalization Officer is responsible for driving data collection, analysis, and visualization initiatives to support operational efficiency and client transparency. The role focuses on gathering project-related data, developing and maintaining dashboards (particularly using Power BI), and providing meaningful insights to management and clients to showcase operational performance and continuous improvement.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Data Management and Collection
Coordinate with project teams to collect, validate, and consolidate operational and performance data from various sources.
Ensure data accuracy, completeness, and consistency across all reporting platforms.
Develop standardized templates and tools for project data submission and tracking.
2. Data Visualization and Reporting
Design, build, and maintain Power BI dashboards to visualize project and operational performance.
Present data insights and performance indicators to internal stakeholders and clients in a clear and professional manner.
Automate recurring reports and develop interactive visual tools to support decision-making.
3. Digitalization Initiatives
Support the implementation of digital tools and platforms to enhance operational efficiency and data-driven management.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify digital solutions for process optimization and reporting improvements.
Participate in digital transformation projects, including workflow automation and data integration initiatives.
4. Performance Monitoring and Analysis
Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) for ongoing projects.
Provide data-driven recommendations to improve operational effectiveness and client satisfaction.
Support management reviews and client presentations with up-to-date performance data.
5. Compliance and Documentation
Maintain proper documentation of data sources, methodologies, and dashboards.
Ensure compliance with company data governance, confidentiality, and security policies.
Qualifications and Experience:
Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Data Analytics, Business Administration, or related field.
Proven experience (2–4 years) in data management, business intelligence, or digital transformation roles.
Proficiency in Microsoft Power BI, Excel (advanced), and data visualization tools.
Familiarity with databases, data cleaning, and integration tools (e.g., SQL, SharePoint, Power Automate) is an advantage.
Strong analytical thinking, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and presentation abilities for both internal and client-facing reporting.
Core Competencies:
Data-driven mindset and analytical approach.
Strong digital literacy and interest in emerging technologies.
Collaboration and teamwork across departments.
Proactive attitude and ability to manage multiple priorities.
Commitment to accuracy, quality, and continuous improvement.

description:
SOLUSIKU is a fast-growing P2P Lending platform committed to providing innovative and responsible financial solutions.
We are looking for an experienced Senior Data Analyst to join our growing fintech team and play a key role in strengthening data-driven decision making, credit risk analytics, and portfolio performance within our P2P Lending business.
Key Responsibilities
·Collect, process, and validate large-scale data from multiple sources while ensuring data integrity and accuracy
Develop, maintain, and optimize databases and data systems to improve accessibility and usability
Perform in-depth analysis of lending and borrower data to identify trends, patterns, and strategic insights
Apply statistical methods and advanced analytics to generate actionable business recommendations
Analyze borrower profiles to assess creditworthiness and predict loan default probabilities
Develop and enhance credit risk models and mitigation strategies to improve portfolio performance
Collaborate closely with Head Office MIS teams regarding database utilization and data governance
Prepare and deliver ad-hoc analytical reports required by management
 Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree or above in Data Science, Statistics, Finance, Economics, Computer Science, or a related field.
Proficiency in data analysis tools and languages such as SQL, Python, R, and Excel
Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI, or similar platforms
Familiarity with database management systems and big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark).
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with attention to detail
Ability to interpret complex data sets and translate findings into actionable insights.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present data clearly
Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional team
2-5 years experience in data analysis; preferably in the financial services or fintech industry
Prior experience in P2P lending or credit risk analysis is highly desirable

Job Summary:
We’re seeking a highly analytical and hands-on Data Analyst to drive insights across product and marketing initiatives for our live mobile game. In this role, you’ll play a key part in understanding player behavior, improving retention and monetization, and supporting data-driven decision-making across the company. Partnering closely with product, marketing, and developer teams, you’ll translate complex data into actionable insights while also owning the underlying data pipelines and analytics infrastructure that power the business.

Work closely with product and marketing teams to deliver actionable insights that improve retention, engagement, and monetization.
Answer product and marketing questions through exploratory analysis and ad-hoc reporting.
Design and analyze A/B tests for game features, events, and monetization experiments.
Build and maintain dashboards for product, marketing, and leadership teams.
Own the end-to-end data pipeline, from raw event ingestion to analysis-ready tables.
Develop and maintain ETL workflows using both internal and third-party sources.
Manage data storage and transformations across S3 and Snowflake.
Orchestrate data workflows using Apache Airflow.
Ensure data quality, consistency, and reliability across the analytics stack.
Leverage GenAI/LLMs to accelerate analysis and development (SQL, Python, ETL, dashboards, documentation), and to create repeatable “analysis playbooks” and faster experiment reporting for stakeholders.
Evaluate and adopt new AI tools and workflows that improve team speed and decision quality, with appropriate validation, testing, and guardrails.
Required Experience
5+ years of experience in data analytics in mobile apps or gaming.
Strong SQL skills with experience querying large, complex datasets.
Experience analyzing user behavior, retention, monetization, and marketing performance.
Familiarity with A/B testing and experimental analysis.
Hands-on experience with modern data tools such as Snowflake, S3, or Airflow.
Experience building and maintaining ETL pipelines.
Experience with BI tools, preferably Looker.
Strong problem-solving skills and a business-oriented mindset.
Comfortable working cross-functionally with product, marketing, and engineering teams.
Self-motivated and able to take ownership of data projects end-to-end.
Strong presentation skills; ability to communicate complex results throughout an organization.
A love or strong desire to work with mobile games.
Demonstrated ability to use GenAI/LLM tools to accelerate analytics and engineering work (e.g., Claude Code, OpenClaw, or similar), with a clear approach to validating AI outputs and ensuring correctness.
Curiosity and initiative to stay current with new LLM models and GenAI tooling, and to apply them responsibly to improve speed, depth, and quality of insights.
Working Hours:
Full Time, flexible schedule
Must have reliable availability during California and European business hours
Compensation:
Competitive salary (paid in local currency)
Comprehensive Health insurance
Paid time off
Employment will be under local company and laws
Opportunity for expanded responsibilities and career development.

Please send your CV, a brief note of interest, and a 1-minute video introducing yourself and describing why you’d be a great fit for this role.

description:
AI / Machine Learning Engineer – Quick Commerce App
Hiring Company: Confidential (Quick-Commerce / Fashion Tech Platform)
Recruitment Partner: Norvex Solutions
Location: Indonesia (Jakarta / Hybrid – as applicable)
Experience: 3–6 years (flexible based on capability)
Employment Type: Full-time
Apply at: Norvex@norvexsolutions.com
Role Overview
Our client, a fast-growing quick-commerce fashion tech company, is building AI-powered features for its mobile application to deliver personalized, real-time shopping experiences.
They are seeking an AI / Machine Learning Engineer to design, build, and scale intelligent features such as virtual wardrobe, outfit recommendations, personalization engines, and computer vision–based fashion recognition. This role is critical to delivering speed, accuracy, and personalization, which are core to quick commerce.
The role involves close collaboration with product, mobile, backend, and design teams in a high-ownership, product-driven environment.
Key Responsibilities
AI & Machine Learning Development
Design and implement computer vision models for clothing detection, classification, and attribute extraction (color, fabric, style, season)
Build recommendation systems using user behavior, purchase history, weather, occasion, and trend data
Develop personalization algorithms tailored to individual user preferences and style
Train, evaluate, and optimize models for low latency and high accuracy, especially for mobile use cases
Virtual Wardrobe & Styling Features
Enable users to upload images or sync purchases to create a digital wardrobe
Implement AI-driven tagging and wardrobe organization
Recommend outfits using:
Existing wardrobe items
Available quick-commerce inventory
Support mix-and-match, styling suggestions, and “buy-to-complete-the-look” experiences
Integration & Performance
Integrate AI models with iOS/Android apps and backend systems
Optimize models for real-time inference and edge/cloud deployment
Work with backend teams to connect AI recommendations to live catalogs and inventory
Ensure solutions scale to support high concurrent traffic
Data, Experimentation & Optimization
Work with large-scale image and behavioral datasets
Run A/B testing to continuously improve recommendation quality
Monitor model performance, bias, and drift in production
Required Skills & Qualifications
Technical Skills
Strong proficiency in Python
Hands-on experience with ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, ONNX
Solid experience in Computer Vision (CNNs, object detection, embeddings)
Proven experience building recommendation systems (collaborative, content-based, hybrid)
Familiarity with mobile ML deployment (TensorFlow Lite, Core ML)
Experience with REST APIs, cloud platforms (AWS / GCP / Azure), and MLOps pipelines
Understanding of databases and data pipelines
Domain & Industry Exposure
Understanding of fashion/apparel attributes and styling concepts (preferred)
Experience with e-commerce or quick-commerce platforms is a strong advantage
Nice-to-Have
Exposure to Generative AI for outfit visualization or styling
Knowledge of LLMs for conversational fashion assistants
Experience with high-scale consumer apps or real-time systems
Familiarity with AR / virtual try-on technologies
What the Client Offers
Opportunity to build cutting-edge AI features for a fast-scaling quick-commerce platform
End-to-end ownership of AI solutions impacting real users
Competitive compensation and long-term growth opportunity
Collaborative, fast-paced, product-first environment

Qualifications & Requirements:
Education: Minimum Bachelor's Degree in Business, Management, Economics, Statistics, or Industrial Engineering.
Experience: Minimum 2-3 years of experience as a Business Analyst or similar position (preferably from the Retail or E-commerce industry).
Analytical Skills: Have strong critical thinking skills, able to connect disparate data points into one logical conclusion.
Technical Capabilities:
Proficient in using Microsoft Excel (Advanced: Pivot Table, VLOOKUP/XLOOKUP, Macro/VBA).
Familiar with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or BI BES.
Understanding SQL basics for data retrieval is a plus.
Business Skills: Understand retail KPI concepts such as Same-Store Sales Growth (SSSG), Sell-through Rate, and Gross Margin Return on Investment (GMROI).
Communication: Able to communicate well and present ideas persuasively to various levels of stakeholders.
Character: Honest, thorough, proactive, and able to work under pressure in a dynamic retail environment.
